document_api_meta.title: Reject Return
document_api_meta.env_desc: Use this API to reject a buyer's return or refund request.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: idempotency_key
request_query_param.desc: The idempotency key is a unique value generated by the client which the server uses to recognize the same request. How you create unique keys is up to you, but we suggest using UUIDs, or another random string with enough entropy to avoid collisions. Idempotency keys can be up to 255 characters long.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: decision
request_body_param.desc:
Return decision, available values:
- `REJECT_REFUND`: Seller rejects the refund request
- `REJECT_RETURN`: Seller rejects the return request
- `REJECT_RECEIVED_PACKAGE`: Seller rejects the received package
- `REJECT_REPLACEMENT`: Seller rejects the replacement request

request_body_param.name: reject_reason
request_body_param.desc: Seller's reason to reject buyer's return request. Please use the [Get Reject Reasons](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650ab658defece02be706f98) endpoint to obtain a list of rejection reasons.

request_body_param.name: comment
request_body_param.desc: Seller's comment on the rejection decision. This is where a seller will provide more information about rejecting the request.

request_body_param.name: images
request_body_param.desc: List of images provided by the seller to support their decision to reject the return request.

request_body_param.name: ^image_id
request_body_param.desc: Image URI obtained from the [Upload Product Image](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509df95defece02be598a22) API.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

error_code_list.msg: An invalid request parameter was passed. Please check that you have the correct parameter type(s) and format.
Unknown return reason. Please ensure you are passing a valid return reason.
reverse reason not match action type
The provided return reason is currently offline. Please select a different return reason.
reverse reason not match reason type
request has been transferred to platform operator
forbid process receive for FBT order
No permission to process this order

sample_code.label: Curl
sample_code.value:
curl -X POST \
 'https://open-api.tiktokglobalshop.com/return_refund/202309/returns/4035319218955782461/reject?app_key=38abcd&sign=5361235029d141222525e303d742f9e38aea052d10896d3197ab9d6233730b8c&timestamp=1623812664&shop_cipher=GCP_XF90igAAAABh00qsWgtvOiGFNqyubMt3&idempotency_key=40b456b1-78e7-412d-9fe6-82181496e1bd' \
-H 'x-tts-access-token: TTP_pwSm2AAAAABmmtFz1xlyKMnwg74T2GJ5s0uQbS8jPjb_GkdFVCxPqzQXSyuyfXdQa0AqyDsea2tYFNVf4XeqgZHFfPyv0Vs659QqyLYfsGzanZ5XZAin3_ZkcIxxS0_In6u6XDeU96k' \
-H 'content-type: application/json' \
-d '{
  "decision": "REJECT_RECEIVED_PACKAGE",
  "reject_reason": "seller_reject_apply_package_has_not_exceeded_estimated_delivery_time",
  "comment": "I have reached an agreement with the buyer",
  "images": [
    {
      "image_id": "tos-maliva-i-o3syd03w52-us/57a1c8908fe74572861ea5e50887d8d1",
      "mime_type": "image/png",
      "height": 200,
      "width": 200
    }
  ]
}'

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func returnRefund202309RejectReturnPost() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.ReturnRefundV202309API.ReturnRefund202309ReturnsReturnIdRejectPost(context.Background(), "4035319218955782461")
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.IdempotencyKey("40b456b1-78e7-412d-9fe6-82181496e1bd")
    request = request.ShopCipher("your shop cipher")
    returnRefund202309RejectReturnRequestBody := returnRefund_v202309.NewReturnRefund202309RejectReturnRequestBody()
    returnRefund202309RejectReturnRequestBody.SetDecision("REJECT_RECEIVED_PACKAGE")
    returnRefund202309RejectReturnRequestBody.SetRejectReason("seller_reject_apply_package_has_not_exceeded_estimated_delivery_time")
    returnRefund202309RejectReturnRequestBody.SetComment("I have reached an agreement with the buyer")
    returnRefund202309RejectReturnRequestBodyImages := returnRefund_v202309.NewReturnRefund202309RejectReturnRequestBodyImages()
    returnRefund202309RejectReturnRequestBodyImages.SetImageId("tos-maliva-i-o3syd03w52-us/57a1c8908fe74572861ea5e50887d8d1")
    returnRefund202309RejectReturnRequestBodyImages.SetMimeType("image/png")
    returnRefund202309RejectReturnRequestBodyImages.SetHeight(200)
    returnRefund202309RejectReturnRequestBodyImages.SetWidth(200)
    returnRefund202309RejectReturnRequestBodyImagesList := []returnRefund_v202309.ReturnRefund202309RejectReturnRequestBodyImages{*returnRefund202309RejectReturnRequestBodyImages}
    returnRefund202309RejectReturnRequestBody.SetImages(returnRefund202309RejectReturnRequestBodyImagesList)
    request = request.ReturnRefund202309RejectReturnRequestBody(*returnRefund202309RejectReturnRequestBody)
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

request_path_param.desc: The identifier of a specific return request.
